PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 35-year-old married woman residing in a metropolitan area on the pacific coast. as a high school graduate, she works a modest job, but her strong protestant faith and active involvement in her church community bring her great fulfillment. sarah is a dedicated republican voter and attends religious services more than once a week, deeply valuing her beliefs and traditions.

despite her busy schedule, sarah makes time to volunteer, driven by a desire to give back to her community. she is an avid internet user, frequently going online several times a day to stay connected and informed. while she prefers to keep some personal details private, such as her race and family income, sarah's warm personality and commitment to her values shine through.

with her deep roots in her faith and community, sarah navigates life's challenges with resilience and finds joy in the simple pleasures of her daily routines. her unwavering dedication to her beliefs and principles serves as a guiding force in her life.
